public class ClientInputHandler extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IClientInput
This class is the client input handler

    • ClientInputHandler

      public ClientInputHandler() throws RemoteException
      Creates and exports a new UnicastRemoteObject object using an anonymous port.
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if failed to export object
      从以下版本开始:
      JDK1.1

    • logIn

      public boolean logIn(String username, IClientCallBack clientCallBack) throws RemoteException, ServerNotActiveException
      log in
      指定者:
      logIn 在接口中 IClientInput
      参数:
      username - username
      clientCallBack - the client callback
      返回:
      true if login successfully, false if the username already exists.
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if failed to export object
      ServerNotActiveException - if the client is not active

    • sendPublicMessage

      public boolean sendPublicMessage(String message, boolean live) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the Client to send a Message in the Match's Chat
      指定者:
      sendPublicMessage 在接口中 IClientInput
      参数:
      message - the message
      live - indicates if the message was sent by live Chat (true) or not (false)
      返回:
      true if the message was correctly sent, otherwise false
      抛出:
      RemoteException - when the Remote Invocation fails

    • sendPrivateMessage

      public boolean sendPrivateMessage(String message, String receiver, boolean live) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the Client to Send a Message to Specific Online Players
      指定者:
      sendPrivateMessage 在接口中 IClientInput
      参数:
      message - the message
      receiver - the online player who will receive the message
      live - indicates if the message was sent by live Chat (true) or not (false)
      返回:
      true if the message was sent to the receiver, otherwise false
      抛出:
      RemoteException - when the Remote Invocation fails
